Text: Plz seed. Been looking like crazy for this!!!

320kb/s, good quality.  However, some of the tracks are incorrectly titled.  For example, BIG HOTEL is actually BOY WONDER and BREAKAWAY is TIN DRUM.

I don't know what other tracks are messed up (although I DO know that the 12" mixes of Breakaway and Hungry Town" are what they say they are.

Overall though, thanks for seeding this high quallity collection.
Thanks heaps for this been looken for a while

all i can say is....THANKYOU!!!! like pre comments..omfg i`m so stoked!!!!
